scripts-descriptions.test-logger: This is just a test to see how basic php script activation is working. Just write composer test-logger into the terminal.
scripts-descriptions.migrate: This should start the migration, and create tables in the db. Just write 'composer migrate'.
scripts-descriptions.seed: This should seed the database with some data. Just write 'composer seed'.
